quizDescription: Test your knowledge of hip hop lyrics from various artists and songs!

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'It was all a dream, I used to read Word Up! magazine, Salt-N-Pepa and Heavy D up in the limousine.'
options: Juicy by The Notorious B.I.G.
Empire State of Mind by Jay-Z ft. Alicia Keys
California Love by 2Pac ft. Dr. Dre
Gin and Juice by Snoop Dogg
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Juicy' by The Notorious B.I.G., a classic hip hop track that reflects on his rise to fame.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'Now, what's cooler than bein' cool? (Ice cold!) I can't hear ya, I say what's cooler than bein' cool? (Ice cold!)'
options: In Da Club by 50 Cent
Lose Yourself by Eminem
Hey Ya! by OutKast
HUMBLE. by Kendrick Lamar
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Hey Ya!' by OutKast, a catchy and upbeat hip hop track with a blend of funk and pop elements.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'It's a celebration, clap clap bravo, lobster and shrimp and a glass of Moscato.'
options: Fancy by Drake ft. T.I. & Swizz Beatz
Started From the Bottom by Drake
I'm On One by DJ Khaled ft. Drake, Rick Ross, & Lil Wayne
No New Friends by DJ Khaled ft. Drake, Rick Ross, & Lil Wayne
questions.answer: I'm On One by DJ Khaled ft. Drake, Rick Ross, & Lil Wayne
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'I'm On One' by DJ Khaled featuring Drake, Rick Ross, and Lil Wayne, a track celebrating success and indulgence.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'She got a big booty so I call her Big Booty.'
options: Mercy by Kanye West ft. Big Sean, Pusha T, & 2 Chainz
Black and Yellow by Wiz Khalifa
Bandz A Make Her Dance by Juicy J ft. Lil Wayne & 2 Chainz
Pop That by French Montana ft. Rick Ross, Drake, & Lil Wayne
questions.answer: Mercy by Kanye West ft. Big Sean, Pusha T, & 2 Chainz
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Mercy' by Kanye West featuring Big Sean, Pusha T, and 2 Chainz, known for its catchy hook.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'I got 99 problems, but a _____ ain't one.'
options: Bitch
Dollar
Beat
Gun
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song '99 Problems' by Jay-Z, where he repeats the phrase 'I got 99 problems, but a bitch ain't one.'

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'Now they always say congratulations, work so hard, forgot how to vacation.'
options: Congratulations by Post Malone ft. Quavo
SICKO MODE by Travis Scott
Goosebumps by Travis Scott ft. Kendrick Lamar
Sick Boy by The Chainsmokers
questions.answer: Congratulations by Post Malone ft. Quavo
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Congratulations' by Post Malone featuring Quavo, a track celebrating success and hard work.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'Started from the bottom, now we're here.'
options: Started From the Bottom by Drake
No Role Modelz by J. Cole
Big Poppa by The Notorious B.I.G.
All of the Lights by Kanye West ft. Rihanna & Kid Cudi
questions.answer: Started From the Bottom by Drake
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Started From the Bottom' by Drake, where he reflects on his rise to success.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'I got this soda, Remmy Martin, doo-doo-ing blow. Running, they was wishing, wishing, they could dabble in my clothes.'
options: Mask Off by Future
Panda by Desiigner
Hotline Bling by Drake
Broccoli by D.R.A.M. ft. Lil Yachty
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Panda' by Desiigner, known for its catchy flow and ad-libs.

questions.question:
Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? '

Young moolah, baby!'
options: No Worries by Lil Wayne ft. Detail
Bank Account by 21 Savage
No Problem by Chance The Rapper ft. Lil Wayne & 2 Chainz
Gimme Dat by Ciara ft. Ludacris
questions.answer: No Worries by Lil Wayne ft. Detail
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'No Worries' by Lil Wayne featuring Detail, where Lil Wayne delivers his signature catchphrase.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'I got the Glock in my 'Rari, 17 shots, no .38.'
options: Bodak Yellow by Cardi B
XO TOUR Llif3 by Lil Uzi Vert
1-800-273-8255 by Logic ft. Alessia Cara & Khalid
Tunnel Vision by Kodak Black
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Tunnel Vision' by Kodak Black, where he refers to his Glock firearm.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'You used to call me on my cellphone, late-night when you need my love.'
options: Hotline Bling by Drake
F**kin' Problems by A$AP Rocky ft. Drake, Kendrick Lamar, & 2 Chainz
Love Yourself by Justin Bieber
I'm the One by DJ Khaled ft. Justin Bieber, Quavo, Chance The Rapper, & Lil Wayne
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Hotline Bling' by Drake, known for its infectious melody and dance moves.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'She see money all around me, I look like I'm the man.'
options: Trophies by Young Money
Jumpman by Drake & Future
All The Way Up by Fat Joe & Remy Ma ft. French Montana
Cut It by O.T. Genasis ft. Young Dolph
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Jumpman' by Drake & Future, where they boast about their success and wealth.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'It's gettin' hot in here, so take off all your clothes.'
options: Ridin' by Chamillionaire ft. Krayzie Bone
Get Low by Lil Jon & The East Side Boyz ft. Ying Yang Twins
Temperature by Sean Paul
Hot In Herre by Nelly
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'Hot In Herre' by Nelly, a club banger known for its catchy chorus.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'They say, 'Oh my God, I see the way you shine. Ayy, ayy, ayy, ayy, ayy, ayy, ayy, ayy.'
options: rockstar by Post Malone ft. 21 Savage
Bad and Boujee by Migos ft. Lil Uzi Vert
Congratulations by Post Malone ft. Quavo
Unforgettable by French Montana ft. Swae Lee
questions.answer: rockstar by Post Malone ft. 21 Savage
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'rockstar' by Post Malone featuring 21 Savage, a hit track about the rockstar lifestyle.

questions.question: Which hip hop song features the following lyrics? 'I'ma get, get, get, get, you drunk, Get you love drunk off my hump.'
options: Fergalicious by Fergie ft. will.i.am
My Humps by The Black Eyed Peas
Uptown Funk by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars
Bust A Move by Young MC
questions.answer: My Humps by The Black Eyed Peas
questions.explanation: These lyrics are from the song 'My Humps' by The Black Eyed Peas, known for its provocative lyrics and catchy beat.
